html:
The weather in Smallenske

PhotoVideo
  • All news tapes
  • News
  • Country and world
  • Society
  • Sport
  • Business
  • Subscription
  • Coronaurus

Smolenska and the field. Main developments in the city

19 minutes ago.
In Smolenska, activists helped to restore order on the child ' s land
Within the framework of the " One Russia " , the " Clean Country " , Saturdays at the regional centre are held regularly.
Today, 17:18
In Smole province, the cemetery thief was sentenced
The resident of the village of Yershichi was in trouble to get 600 rubles.
Today, 16:35
The reason for the death of a man at the entrance of the Sedov Street in Smallsk was known.

We will recall that, on 18 January this year, one of the apartment houses in the stairwellFound the victim.brutal murder. Some sources claimed that there was a “occupied head”. In fact, a man's body was found entirely.

Today, 16:17
The Smolena NPP has handed to Desnojursk new special equipment for the improvement of road infrastructure

Four tractors for the cleaning of urban roads and a recycler for ammonial repairs were admitted to the municipal budget facility of the Upgrading Service. The keys to the vehicles were given to the head of the city by Pavel Lubenski, Director of the Small Nuclear Power Plant.

Today, 15:52
In the smolen radius, near the scene of a terrible accident, there will be " proper police "

We will recall that on 6 June last year, at around 1400 hours, a drunk driver on the Mazda 6 vehicle at the rounded road failed to manage. In the area of the house number 40 on the street of Gureevsky, he went to the curb and ran into a metal fence...

Today, 15:14
In the Smole region, the first rounds of microfuthsal and volleyball rounds were summarized
The competition is part of a large part of the party ' s " Know what he was! " project, which the Russian Federation launched into the anniversary of Yuri Gagarin ' s birth.
Today, 14:35
In the Smole region, there has been a short cold
The weather will be more like winter during the weekend, and the thermometer poles, for just a couple of days, but they will go to the area of negative values.
Today, 13:43
In the Smole region, 17 explosives were destroyed

This was reported in the DG Fire and Rescue Service. The weapons were seized in the Roslavli district.

Today, 13:05
In the Smolene region, an intellectual game was held in honour of lifting the blockade of Leningrad
On 25 January, the Father ' s Advocates Foundation held a historic intellectual key to RUSK. Blocada Leningrad, organized by the staff of the Centre for Military Patriotic Education and Training of Citizens in Military Service with the regional division...
Today, 12:29
Smolenska ' s Cultural Office will be replaced by a manager
On 31 January, Anna Yvchenko will be the last day of work for this post.
Today, 11:50
In 2023, 2,125 Russian residents visited the Smolenian EPA.

The interest in nuclear technology is growing, compared with 2022, the number of tours tripled three times.


Today, 11:38
In the Smolene village, the ash almost caused trouble
The illegal storage of ash and coal caused a fire in the economic structure yesterday in the village of Durovo Safonov district
Today, 11:00.
In Smolenska, the tram schedules were adjusted.
From now on, the change of drivers and their lunch breaks will not come at peak hours. Previously, the head of the city of Alexander Novik gave an order to change the schedules.
Today, 09:53
The most cold marathon of the world.
Maksim Moscalenko, a resident of the Safon region, took part in the " Polys Holod - Oymakon " escape from more than 42 km at a temperature of 57 °C.
Today, 08:50
As in the smear center, ambulance saved a man's life.

The incident occurred on 21 January this year in Demidov. When the victim was kicked out of his death laps, they told the ambulance station.

Today, 08:03
Smylanin will go to corrections for refusing to pay a million maintenance debts.

For ignoring the obligations, the father was criminalized. The court sentenced a man to six months ' imprisonment.

Today, 07:22
Smolenska will have a winter beard competition.
All interested will be able to participate.
Yesterday, 2200.
In the Smole region, the Public Prosecutor ' s Office initiated 7 criminal cases in the field of environmental protection

The office shared the results for 2023. The Public Prosecutor ' s Office stressed that oversight of environmental law enforcement and the rights of moles to a favourable environment remained a priority.

yesterday, 21:20
Mayor Smolenska congratulated the beginning of the Family Year.

By decree of President Vladimir Putin, this year has been declared the Year of the Family. Yesterday, Governor Vasili Anohin opened it for the region. Today, it was opened for the regional centre in a solemn stop.

Yesterday, 20:38
In the Smolene region, a three-year-old driver tried to appeal the sentence

We will recall that last June, a man in a state of alcohol intoxication ran into a roadblock on the Gureevsky Street in Demidov. As a result of the accident, two children were killedserious health damage♪
